alert.note: Alert for Merced (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 11 at 12:33AM PST until further notice by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in California... Merced River at Stevinson affecting Merced County. For the Merced River...including Happy Isles, Pohono Bridge, Stevinson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Merced River at Stevinson. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM PST Friday the stage was 69.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to around flood stage this morning and continue rising to 72.9 feet late this evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 71.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 73.8 feet on 12/05/1950. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 1245 PM PST.
